title: Bounty Bro
author: Bounty Bro
content: Have you seen Elon Coin shills recently? When we are asking a normal question in a Bitcoin section, soon desperate Elon Coin shills will show up. It's really getting worse how greedy desperate shitposters can get for a few buck. We have enough fraudulent coin on Bitcointalk, now we have Elon Coin shills as well. Beware!

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: OP you should move your post to the suitable section and I think Reputation is best place for discussion. If you don't know how to move then check [Lesson] How to Correct Move TopicBelow is Nutildah thread he reported against Bitget shilllers and you can do the same https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5472656.0Shilling any coins illegitimately is worst and should be punished. This forum is one of the best place for learning and getting true information. BTT google SEO is on the top and this why some spammers also misuse it. I don't know why Elon project doing so as they already have a signature compaign for this purpose.

comments.author: Bounty Bro
comments.body: Hello Sir! Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on December 14, 2023, 02:30:13 AMOP you should move your post to the suitable section and I think Reputation is best place for discussion. If you don't know how to move then check [Lesson] How to Correct Move TopicGood idea, I will move topic tomorrow. I know how to move, will do later. Lock for now and I will move topic tomorrow. Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on December 14, 2023, 02:30:13 AMShilling any coins illegitimately is worst and should be punished. This forum is one of the best place for learning and getting true information. Yes, punish like BSV shill. A fraudulent shit project can be very damaging because of loss. Quote from: Gladitorcomeback on December 14, 2023, 02:30:13 AMBTT google SEO is on the top and this why some spammers also misuse it. I don't know Google CEO but BlackRock CEO likes Bitcoin.
